# Download Sales and Trends Reports

**Web Service Endpoint**

Download sales and trends reports filtered by your specified criteria.

## Discussion

### Allowed values based on sales report type

Each sales report type has specific valid values for `reportType`, `reportSubType`, `frequency`, and `version`. If you use other types, it results in an error. For more details on each report type, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/view-sales-and-trends/download-and-view-reports].





## Downloading Reports

- **Download Finance Reports**: Download finance reports filtered by your specified criteria.

items.description: Download finance reports filtered by your specified criteria.
